amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. 7xx. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide assistance under title II of the Food for Peace Act (7 U.S.C. 1721 et seq.) to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (North Korea).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to provide assistance under the Food for Peace Act to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Royce.
